name: Garmin Fenix 6 Pro - Unisex
description: Play music, get to the best trails, see who’s calling – this watch does it all. The do-everything Fenix line blends a smartwatch, sport watch and a backcountry GPS. Elevate heart rate monitor reads your pulse off your wrist, even while swimming. When you need more info, or a little motivation, the free Connect app pairs with your phone to download training plans, get texts, social media alerts and emails. The music mode streams music services via your phone, or transfers songs and podcasts. Detailed maps offer turn-by-turn directions. Round-trip routing makes set-distance runs easy, and features like activity tracking, sleep monitoring, music playback and smart notifications make the Fenix 6 useful every day, not just on training days.Built-in modes for biking, running, swimming (indoor and out), multisport, gym (strength training, cardio and elliptical, stair stepping, rowing, yoga), golf (41,000+ course maps), skiing (2000+ ski resort maps) and more.Includes North American map data with room to add maps.Multiple map themes customize your map screen, from heatmaps, to ski resorts, marine settings and more.Point of interest navigation for: restaurants, attractions, accommodations.Choose a distance, and get 6 options through round-trip mapping.Trendline™ routing identifies popular roures.Stream music through a phone using Spotify, Amazon Music, and more. download playlists and podcasts directly (Spotify premium account required), or add MP3s from your computer.Synched playlists can be updated via Wi-Fi.Holds up to 2000 songs.ClimbPro™ (available on preloaded courses only) lets you know grade, total ascent, and elevation profile, so you can pace yourself.PacePro™ (available on preloaded courses only) sets a desired pace, breaks your distance splits, and calculates needed pace for your goal.Body Battery™ mode tracks daily energy levels, monitoring exercise as well rest and food, so you get a better idea of how and when to train.Garmin Pay™ lets you make payments with your watch (if supported by your bank).Strava Segment integration, both preloaded and on-the-fly, lets you know when starred segments begin, plus PR, current KOM or QOM, and provides results once complete. (requires Strava premium).LiveTrack shares location and fitness data through a phone.Connects to 3 different satellite constellations (GPS, GLONASS and Galileo) and caches satellite positions.V3 Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor works while swimming. Elevate V3 has a red LED for Pulse Ox data.Physiological metrics includes VO2 max, a race predictor, recovery advisor and performance indicator – many take temperature and altitude into consideration.Training load uses data from your past 7-days of workouts to let you know if you are overtraining or under-training.Compatible with running dynamics sensors (sold separately).Incident detection uses internal sensors to detect accidents and sends signals through your paired smartphone to alert someone that you need help.Assistance mode sends out a message with a LiveTrack link that lets your contacts know where you are.24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle.On board sleep tracking shows total sleep and periods of restful sleep.Free Garmin Connect app lets you review activities, receive texts, social media alerts and email; download training plans, and track weather via Bluetooth.Connect IQ support allows you to download apps, widgets, templates, data fields and more.UltraTrac™ mode reduces the GPS recording rate to conserve battery.Pre-set power profiles and custom power profiles let you maximize your battery’s power.Tough, non-reflective Gorilla Glass© crystal.ABC data comes in via the internal altimeter, barometer and a tilt-compensated electronic compass.In the box: fēnix 6, charging cable and documentation.
